snippet: Johan Santana was on his way to making a return after shoulder surgery, but he tore a tendon on Friday.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Baltimore Orioles pitcher Johan Santana tears his Achilles' tendon during extended spring training, ending comeback bid following shoulder surgery; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Johan Santana was on his way to making a return after shoulder surgery, but he tore a tendon on Friday.

headline.main: Santana’s Comeback Try Is Halted by Achilles’ Tear
headline.print_headline: Santana’s Comeback Try Is Halted by Achilles Tear
